systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

targetResourceId.Description: Identity for resource within Microsoft cloud.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

impactStartTime.Description: It provides the Timestamp for when the health impacting event started.

impactMitigationTime.Description: It provides the Timestamp for when the health impacting event resolved.

impact.Description: List services impacted by the service health event.

faqs.Description: Frequently asked questions for the service health event.

isHIR.Description: It provides information if the event is High incident rate event or not.

enableMicrosoftSupport.Description: Tells if we want to enable or disable Microsoft Support for this event.

description.Description: Contains the communication message for the event, that could include summary, root cause and other details.

platformInitiated.Description: Is true if the event is platform initiated.

enableChatWithUs.Description: Tells if we want to enable or disable Microsoft Support for this event.

priority.Description: Priority level of the event. Has value from 0 to 23. 0 is the highest priority. Service issue events have higher priority followed by planned maintenance and health advisory. Critical events have higher priority followed by error, warning and informational. Furthermore, active events have higher priority than resolved.

lastUpdateTime.Description: It provides the Timestamp for when the health impacting event was last updated.

parameters.Description: It provides a map of parameter name and value

extensionName.Description: It provides the name of portal extension to produce link for given service health event.

bladeName.Description: It provides the name of portal extension blade to produce link for given service health event.

parameters.Description: It provides a map of parameter name and value for portal extension blade to produce lik for given service health event.

impactedRegions.Description: List regions impacted by the service health event.

status.Description: Current status of event in the region.

impactedSubscriptions.Description: List subscription impacted by the service health event.

impactedTenants.Description: List tenant impacted by the service health event.

lastUpdateTime.Description: It provides the Timestamp for when the last update for the service health event.

updates.Description: List of updates for given service health event.

summary.Description: Summary text for the given update for the service health event.

updateDateTime.Description: It provides the Timestamp for the given update for the service health event.

message.Description: Recommended action title for the service health event.

actions.Description: Recommended actions for the service health event.

localeCode.Description: Recommended action locale for the service health event.

groupId.Description: Recommended action group Id for the service health event.

question.Description: FAQ question for the service health event.

answer.Description: FAQ answer for the service health event.

localeCode.Description: FAQ locale for the service health event.
